name: Baxley Air
about: Baxley Aviation, located at Baxley Municipal Airport in Georgia, is a dedicated flight training institution offering a comprehensive range of aviation programs. Our highly experienced instructors provide personalized training for private, instrument, and commercial pilot certifications. With a focus on safety and excellence, we ensure that each student receives the highest quality instruction to achieve their flying goals. Our facilities include well-maintained aircraft and a supportive learning environment, making Baxley Aviation an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. We are committed to helping you take to the skies with confidence and skill.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Intro Flight
Commercial
Private Pilot"]
